## Carry Recipe
_Taiwanese – Base Size Plus 1 – 2 Traditional Sling Passes + Torso Pass_

- Off center Traditional Sling Pass with short tail to hip over shoulder
- Long tail spreads across chest under short tail and flips back over open shoulder
- Across baby for Traditional Sling Pass
- Long tail spreads across chest under short tail and flips back on itself for a Torso Pass
- TIF & spread shoulders
